name: Weatherford International plc
description: Weatherford International plc is a leading global provider of equipment and services for the oil and natural gas industry. Established in 1941, Weatherford operates in over 90 countries, offering a wide range of solutions to enhance the performance of oil and gas operations. The company specializes in drilling, evaluation, completion, production, and intervention services and technologies. Weatherford's innovative products are designed to optimize the lifecycle of the well, enabling its clients to improve efficiency, enhance recovery, and reduce costs. With a focus on sustainable practices, Weatherford is committed to delivering safe, efficient, and environmentally friendly solutions to its customers. The company is also actively engaged in research and development to drive technological advancements in the energy sector. Weatherford’s mission is to provide the best solutions for its customers while maintaining the highest standards of safety and ethics in its operations.
